tool.name: OSMGPCombineAttributes

param.name: in_osmfeatureclass
param.dialogReference: Input feature class containing the attribute fields to be combined.
param.pythonReference: Input feature class containing the attribute fields to be combined.

param.name: in_attributeselect
param.dialogReference: Attribute fields that can be translated into tag key/value pairs for OpenStreetMap attribution.
param.pythonReference: Attribute fields that can be translated into tag key/value pairs for OpenStreetMap attribution.

tool.summary: This tool allows the user to combine user defined attribute fields into a field containing the OpenStreetMap tags.
tool.usage: This tool allows the user to combine user defined attribute fields into a field containing the OpenStreetMap tags.

scriptExample.title: Combine OSM Attributes Sample (Python)
scriptExample.para: This Python window sample demonstrates how to combine multiple fields and store them into the OpenStreetMap tag field.
scriptExample.code:
# import the system modules import arcpy from arcpy import env
# load the OpenStreetMap specific toolbox arcpy.ImportToolbox(r'd:\projects\OSMEditor\WheelChairMap\OpenStreetMap Toolbox.tbx')
# set the workspace for the existing OpenStreetMap data env.workspace = r'd:\projects\OSMEditor\WheelChairMap\defaultstorage.gdb'
# select the fields to be combined into the OpenStreetMap collection of tags arcpy.OSMGPCombineAttributes_osmtools(r'stuttgart\stuttgart_osm_pt', "osm_name;osm_note")

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool allows the user to combine user defined attribute fields into a field containing the OpenStreetMap tags.
